description: We take a deep dive into the Inner Circle Task Force Detachment and look at how it can be played competitively.
title: Detachment Focus: Inner Circle Task Force

description: Welcome, my friends! It is I, your prince of the pigment, come among you once again to bestow primordial philosophy passed on to me by the primarchs populating the pantheon of painting.  Just kidding. It’s a paint review! You read the title already, didn’t you? You’re smart, everyone knows that. Today’s test subject in the […]
title: TTCombat Paint Review

description: Picked up a new Codex and a new Army, or revisiting an old force in a new edition? Welcome to Start Reading 40k, our guide to the best novels of the Black Library for each faction slugging it out in the Grim Dark Far Future. Each article will cover our top picks for reading about […]
title: Start Reading: Astra Militarum

description: Stormbringer is a weekly hobby magazine from Hachette Partworks introducing players to Warhammer: Age of Sigmar. In this 80-week series, our intrepid magazine-receiver will be reviewing each individual issue, its included models, and gaming materials. A Premium US subscription was provided to Goonhammer for review purposes. If you want to follow along at home, US […]
title: SRM’s Ongoing Stormbringer Review: Week 42

description: It’s part 2 of Competitive Innovations, and chivalry continues to be back as the Imperial Knights face off with Genestealer Cults in our big Showdown. Elsewhere, various top factions continue to make their presence known as we head towards our next clutch of big supermajors, so there’s plenty to dig into. Today Lowest of Men is […]
title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: Tally Ho pt.2
